member.name: T:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolButton
member.summary: The DotCoolButton is a button control that supports button of various shapes, as well as displays stunning visual effects. Visual effects, include, but are not limited to various types customizable gradients, borders, images and text. Both the effects and functionality of the button can be made to be state-specific, such as producing various effects for when the button is in a Normal or Disabled state, as well various types of mouse interactions, such as MouseDown and MouseOver events.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolButton.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor

member.name: P:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolButton.BackGradientSettingsMouseDown
member.summary: Background gradient settings of the DotCoolControl when the mouse button is pushed down on the control.

member.name: P:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolButton.TextSettingsMouseDown
member.summary: Text/Caption display settings of the DotCoolControl when the mouse button is pushed down on the control.

member.name: P:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolButton.ImageSettingsMouseDown
member.summary: Image display settings of the DotCoolControl when the mouse button is pushed down on the control.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolButton.OnResize(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: The DotCoolButton will have its control border's sized to the bounds of the control. Certain classes like the DotCoolButton and DotCoolLabel will control the size of the control's border from the DotCoolControl base class in the Resize event. The control's border are not accessible to the user in these types of controls.

member.name: P:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolButton.DrawFocusRect
member.summary: Indicates where in the button the focus rectangle will be drawn when the control has focus.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolButton.Clone
member.summary: Clones all properties and settings of the DotCoolButton control to a new DotCoolButton control.

member.name: T:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolCheckBox
member.summary: The DotCoolCheckBox is a checkbox control that supports check boxes and check symbols of various shapes, as well as displays stunning visual effects. Visual effects, include, but are not limited to various types customizable gradients, borders, images and text. In addition, custom images can be displayed for the check symbol. Both the effects and functionality of the checkbox can be made to be state-specific, such as producing various effects for when the button is in a Normal or Disabled state, as well various types of mouse interactions, such as MouseOver events.

member.name: E:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolCheckBox.CheckStateChanged
member.summary: The event that is raised when the check state property of the DotCoolCheckBox control is changed.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolCheckBox.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor

member.name: P:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolCheckBox.BorderColorSettings
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of the control's border for each associated control state.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolCheckBox.GetImage
member.summary: Gets the appropriate check symbol image that will be displayed in the box portion of the control based on the control's current state.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolCheckBox.GetImageAlign
member.summary: Gets the appropriate image alignment of the check symbol image displayed in the control based on the control's current state.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolCheckBox.GetImageOffset
member.summary: Gets the appropriate X and Y offset positions of the check symbol image displayed in the control based on the control's current state.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolCheckBox.GetImageTransColor
member.summary: Gets the appropriate transparent color of the check symbol image displayed in the control based on the control's current state.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolCheckBox.GetCheckBorderColor
member.summary: Gets the appropriate border color of the check symbol based on the control's current state.

member.name: P:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolCheckBox.CheckBorderColorSettings
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of the gradient check symbol's border for each associated control state.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolCheckBox.GetCheckGradientColor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the appropriate gradient start or ending color of the gradient check symbol based on the control's current state.
member.param: 1 = Gradient Starting Color, 2 = Gradient Ending Color

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolCheckBox.GetCheckGradientType
member.summary: Gets the appropriate gradient type of the gradient check symbol based on the control's current state.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolCheckBox.GetCheckGradientSpan
member.summary: Gets the appropriate gradient span value of the gradient check symbol based on the control's current state.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolCheckBox.GetCheckGradientOffset
member.summary: Gets the appropriate gradient X and Y offset position of the gradient check symbol based on the control's current state.

member.name: P:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolCheckBox.CheckGradientSettingsIndeterminate
member.summary: Gradient settings of the check symbol portion of the control when the control is in an indeterminate state.

member.name: P:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolCheckBox.ImageSettingsIndeterminate
member.summary: Image display settings of the DotCoolControl when the control is in an indeterminate state.

member.name: P:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolCheckBox.CheckState
member.summary: Gets/Sets a value indicating if the check control is checked, unchecked or in an indeterminate state.

member.name: P:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolCheckBox.Checked
member.summary: Gets/Sets a value indicating if the check control is checked or unchecked.

member.name: P:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolCheckBox.ThreeState
member.summary: Gets/Sets a value indicating if the DotCoolCheckBox will allow three check states, rather than two.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolCheckBox.OnCheckStateChanged(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Raises the CheckStateChanged event of the DotCoolCheckBox control.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolCheckBox.OnClick(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Raises the Click event of the control. When the control is clicked, the state of the checkbox will be changed according to the current state the checkbox was set before it was clicked.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolCheckBox.OnDoubleClick(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: The DotCoolCheckBox will not raise a DoubleClick event, so a double click on the control will result in the control raising a Click event, instead.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolCheckBox.Clone
member.summary: Clones all properties and settings of the DotCoolCheckBox control to a new DotCoolCheckBox control.

member.name: T:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolCheckBoxBorderColorSettings
member.summary: Contains the control border color setting propeties for a specific control state associated with a DotCoolCheckBox. The control border color setting property set wil allow user's to access various border color settings from the property designer in an organized manner. Each border color property setting will be linked to a border visual setting contained in a DotCoolCtlBorderSetingsList class.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolCheckBoxBorderColorSettings.#ctor(DotCoolControls.DotCoolCtlBorderSettingsList)
member.summary: Constructor.

member.name: P:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolCheckBoxBorderColorSettings.BorderColorMouseDown
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of the control's border when the mouse button is pushed down on the control. Control state NOT USED for check controls.

member.name: P:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolCheckBoxBorderColorSettings.BorderColorIndeterminate
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of the control's border when the control is in an indeterminate state.

member.name: T:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolNativeButton
member.summary: An expansion of the native .NET button control that displays stunning visual effects. Visual effects, include, but are not limited to various types customizable gradients and text. Both the effects and functionality of the button can be made to be state-specific, such as producing various effects for when the button is in a Normal or Disabled state, as well various types of mouse interactions, such as MouseDown and MouseOver events.

member.name: F:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolNativeButton.m_GradBackSettingsList
member.summary: Contains the various gradient settings for the background of the DotCoolNativeButton class.

member.name: F:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolNativeButton.m_TextSettingsList
member.summary: Contains the various text and font settings for the caption displayed in the DotCoolNativeButton class.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolNativeButton.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolNativeButton.DrawGradientBackgroundImage
member.summary: Draws the gradient background image of the DotCoolNativeButton according to the background gradient settings that are set for the control. NOTE: The DotCoolNativeButton will use the button's background image, rather than the paint event handlers to render the background gradient image so that the button's native functionality can be maintained.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolNativeButton.ClearGradientBackgroundImage
member.summary: Clears the current gradient background image set in the DotCoolNativeButton.

member.name: P:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolNativeButton.Enabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control can respond to user interaction.

member.name: P:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolNativeButton.DrawBackgroundGradient
member.summary: Indicates if the background will be drawn with a gradient, using the background gradient settings set in the control.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolNativeButton.GetBackGradientColor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the appropriate background gradient start or ending color of the control based on the control's current state.
member.param: 1 = Gradient Starting Color, 2 = Gradient Ending Color

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolNativeButton.GetBackGradientType
member.summary: Gets the appropriate background gradient type of the control based on the control's current state.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolNativeButton.GetBackGradientSpan
member.summary: Gets the appropriate background gradient span value of the control based on the control's current state.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolNativeButton.GetBackGradientOffset
member.summary: Gets the appropriate background gradient X and Y offset position of the control based on the control's current state.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolNativeButton.GetBackGradientSettings(DotCoolControls.VisualSettings.VisualSettingEnum)
member.summary: Gets the set of gradient background control settings for the control state specified in the function's setting parameter.

member.name: P:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolNativeButton.BackGradientSettings
member.summary: Background gradient settings of the DotCoolNativeButton when the control is in its normal state.

member.name: P:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolNativeButton.BackGradientSettingsDisabled
member.summary: Background gradient settings of the DotCoolNativeButton when the control is in its disabled state.

member.name: P:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolNativeButton.BackGradientSettingsMouseDown
member.summary: Background gradient settings of the DotCoolNativeButton when the mouse button is pushed down on the control.

member.name: P:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolNativeButton.BackGradientSettingsMouseOver
member.summary: Background gradient settings of the DotCoolNativeButton when the mouse cursor is over the control.

member.name: P:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolNativeButton.BackgroundImageLayout
member.summary: Gets or sets the background image layout as defined in the System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout enumeration.

member.name: P:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolNativeButton.Font
member.summary: Gets or sets the font of the text displayed in the button.

member.name: P:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolNativeButton.ForeColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the foreground color of the button.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolNativeButton.UpdateButtonText
member.summary: Updates the font, color and other related settings of the caption of the DotCoolNativeButton with respect to the current state of the button. The font, color and text display settings will depend on whether the button is in a normal state or if the mouse is being moved over the button or the button is currently pushed down.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolNativeButton.GetTextSettings(DotCoolControls.VisualSettings.VisualSettingEnum)
member.summary: Gets the set of control text/caption settings for the control state specified in the function's setting parameter.

member.name: P:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolNativeButton.TextSettings
member.summary: Text/Caption display settings of the DotCoolNativeButton when the control is in its normal state.

member.name: P:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolNativeButton.TextSettingsDisabled
member.summary: Text/Caption display settings of the DotCoolNativeButton when the control is in its disabled state.

member.name: P:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolNativeButton.TextSettingsMouseDown
member.summary: Text/Caption display settings of the DotCoolNativeButton when the mouse button is pushed down on the control.

member.name: P:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolNativeButton.TextSettingsMouseOver
member.summary: Text/Caption display settings of the DotCoolNativeButton when the mouse cursor is over the control.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolNativeButton.OnMouseEnter(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Overrides the OnMouseEnter event to handle the drawing of gradients and the button text when the mouse cursor moves over the button.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolNativeButton.OnMouseLeave(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Overrides the OnMouseLeave event to handle the drawing of gradients and the button text when the mouse cursor moves outside the region of the button.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolNativeButton.OnMouseDown(System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs)
member.summary: Overrides the OnMouseDown event to handle the drawing of gradients and the button text when the mouse's left button is pushed down on the button.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolNativeButton.OnMouseUp(System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs)
member.summary: Overrides the OnMouseUp event to handle the drawing of gradients and the button text when the mouse's left button is pushed up on the button.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolNativeButton.GradBackSettingsList_SettingChanged(DotCoolControls.VisualSettings.VisualSettingEnum,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: When any property contained in the background gradient settings list is changed, the SettingChanged event will be raised to allow the DotCoolNativeButton control to update the control's UI. It is necessary to update the UI through the SettingChanged event since the DotCoolNativeButton control will manipulate specific text related properties of the .NET button control to integrate the DotCool visual text settings in the control.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolNativeButton.TextSettingsList_SettingChanged(DotCoolControls.VisualSettings.VisualSettingEnum,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: When any property contained in the text settings list is changed, the SettingChanged event will be raised to allow the DotCoolNativeButton control to update the control's UI. It is necessary to update the UI through the SettingChanged event since the DotCoolNativeButton control is not owner-drawn and uses the derived .NET button control's background image property to draw its gradient background.

member.name: T:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolPanel
member.summary: An expansion of the native .NET panel control that displays stunning gradient effects. Both the effects and functionality of the panel can be made to be state-specific, such as producing various effects for when the panel is in a Normal or Disabled state, as well various types of mouse interactions, such as MouseDown and MouseOver events. The DotCoolPanel can also be used to display gradient backgrounds for DotCoolControls contained within the panel.

member.name: F:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolPanel.m_GradBackSettingsList
member.summary: Contains the various gradient settings for the background of the DotCoolPanel class.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolPanel.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor

member.name: P:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolPanel.CreateParams
member.summary: Gets the required creation parameters when the control handle is created.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolPanel.OnPaint(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)
member.summary: Handles all custom GDI/drawing/painting operations of the DotCoolPanel, including the drawing of the control's gradients.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolPanel.DrawBackGradientImage(System.Drawing.Graphics)
member.summary: Draws the background gradient image in the control based on the various gradient settings that are set for the control. All drawing will be performed in memory-based device context before rendering onto the control to allow for flicker-free drawing.

member.name: P:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolPanel.Enabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control can respond to user interaction.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolPanel.OnMouseLeave(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: If the control's selection behavior is set to Control, then raises the MouseLeave event. In the case the selection behavior is set to Border, the MouseLeave event will not be raised by the control unless the mouse was previously moved within the boundaries of the control's borders. If it was detected that the mouse has moved within the boundaries of the control's border, then the MouseLeave event will be raised and the MouseOver flag will be set to false.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolPanel.OnMouseMove(System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs)
member.summary: If the control's selection behavior is set to Control, then raises the MouseMove event. In the case the control's selection behavior is set to Border, the MouseMove event will be used to detect if the mouse cursor has been moved within the boundaries of the control's border. If the mouse cursor is detected within the border of the control, then the MouseMove event will be raised. As well, the MouseEnter event will be raised from the MouseMove event when the mouse cursor first enters the boundaries of the control's border.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolPanel.OnMouseDown(System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs)
member.summary: If the control's selection behavior is set to Control, then raises the MouseDown event. In the case the selection behavior is set to Border, the MouseDown event will be raised only when the mouse button is pushed down while the mouse cursor is located within the boundaries of the control's border.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolPanel.OnMouseUp(System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs)
member.summary: The event will be raised when the mouse button is released after being pushed down while the mouse cursor was located within the boundaries of the control's border.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolPanel.OnClick(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: The Click event will be raised when the mouse button is clicked within the boundaries of the control's border.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolPanel.OnDoubleClick(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: The event will be raised when the mouse button is double-clicked within the boundaries of the control's border.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolPanel.GetBackGradientColor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the appropriate background gradient start or ending color of the control based on the control's current state.
member.param: 1 = Gradient Starting Color, 2 = Gradient Ending Color

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolPanel.GetBackGradientType
member.summary: Gets the appropriate background gradient type of the control based on the control's current state.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolPanel.GetBackGradientSpan
member.summary: Gets the appropriate background gradient span value of the control based on the control's current state.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolPanel.GetBackGradientOffset
member.summary: Gets the appropriate background gradient X and Y offset position of the control based on the control's current state.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolPanel.GetBackGradientSettings(DotCoolControls.VisualSettings.VisualSettingEnum)
member.summary: Gets the set of gradient background control settings for the control state specified in the function's setting parameter.

member.name: P:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolPanel.BackGradientSettings
member.summary: Background gradient settings of the DotCoolPanel when the control is in its normal state.

member.name: P:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolPanel.BackGradientSettingsDisabled
member.summary: Background gradient settings of the DotCoolPanel when the control is in its disabled state.

member.name: P:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolPanel.BackGradientSettingsMouseOver
member.summary: Background gradient settings of the DotCoolPanel when the mouse cursor is over the control.

member.name: P:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolPanel.BackGradientSettingsMouseDown
member.summary: Background gradient settings of the DotCoolPanel when the mouse button is pushed down on the control.

member.name: T:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolRadioButton
member.summary: The DotCoolRadioButton is a radiobutton control that supports radio boxes and check symbols of various shapes, as well as displays stunning visual effects. Visual effects, include, but are not limited to various types customizable gradients, borders, images and text. In addition, custom images can be displayed for the check symbol. Both the effects and functionality of the radiobutton can be made to be state-specific, such as producing various effects for when the button is in a Normal or Disabled state, as well various types of mouse interactions, such as MouseOver events.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolRadioButton.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor

member.name: P:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolRadioButton.BorderColorSettings
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of the control's border for each associated control state.

member.name: P:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolRadioButton.CheckBorderColorSettings
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of the gradient check symbol's border for each associated control state.

member.name: P:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolRadioButton.SelectOnFocus
member.summary: Indicates if the radio button will be selected when it receives the focus.

member.name: P:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolRadioButton.Checked
member.summary: Gets/Sets a value indicating if the check control is checked or unchecked.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolRadioButton.UpdateGroupSelection
member.summary: Updates the state of all DotCoolRadioButton controls that are contained in the same container as the DotCoolRadioButton control that is selected. Only one radio button in the container can be selected at a time.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolRadioButton.OnClick(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Raises the Click event of the control. When the control is clicked, the radio button will be selected and the previously selected radio button in the group (container control) will be deselected.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolRadioButton.OnDoubleClick(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: The DotCoolRadioButton will not raise a DoubleClick event, so a double click on the control will result in the control raising a Click event, instead.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolRadioButton.OnGotFocus(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: When the radio button control receives the focus and the SelectOnFocus property is set to true, the active radio button will be selected.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.WinForms.DotCoolRadioButton.Clone
member.summary: Clones all properties and settings of the DotCoolRadioButton control to a new DotCoolRadioButton control.
